23#ifndef TCLAP_VERSION_VISITOR_H
24#define TCLAP_VERSION_VISITOR_H
25
26#include <tclap/CmdLineInterface.h>
27#include <tclap/CmdLineOutput.h>
28#include <tclap/Visitor.h>
29
30namespace TCLAP {
31
36class VersionVisitor : public Visitor {
37private:
41 VersionVisitor(const VersionVisitor &rhs);
42 VersionVisitor &operator=(const VersionVisitor &rhs);
43
44protected:
48 CmdLineInterface *_cmd;
49
53 CmdLineOutput **_out;
54
55public:
61 VersionVisitor(CmdLineInterface *cmd, CmdLineOutput **out)
62 : Visitor(), _cmd(cmd), _out(out) {}
63
68 void visit() {
69 (*_out)->version(*_cmd);
70 throw ExitException(0);
71 }
72};
73} // namespace TCLAP
74
75#endif // TCLAP_VERSION_VISITOR_H
